channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins GitHub Pull Request Builder Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins GitHub Pull Request Builder Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-24435|2024-08-02T10:56:03.902Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20github%20pull%20request%20builder%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins GitHub Pull Request Builder Plugin 1.42.2 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2023-24436|2024-08-02T10:56:04.180Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20github%20pull%20request%20builder%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins GitHub Pull Request Builder Plugin 1.42.2 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2023-24434|2024-08-02T10:56:04.192Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20github%20pull%20request%20builder%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins GitHub Pull Request Builder Plugin 1.42.2 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.
